Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Arcade Hall, Ashington, Northumberland, England, UK Hymn tune contest - 1st North Seaton, 2nd Bedlington, 3rd Cowpen and Crofton. 7 bands competed.
Dec. 22, 2012, 11:18 a.m. Feb. 7, 2019, 5:07 p.m.
1 North Seaton W. S. Bond
2 Coxlodge Institute Band J. C. Walsh
3 Bedlington Dr Pit Workmens Band William Farrall
4 Burradon Joseph Welsh
5 Cowpen and Crofton Workmen's Band J. B. Bootland
